name: MatchAndTalk - Live Video Chat With Strangers
description: Join the unlimited entertainment. MatchAndTalk is an application where you can start video chat, voice chat and send message instantly with beautiful girls and handsome men from all over the world. Start your free membership and start live video chatting and stream with member you like, or any member randomly. When you are bored and want to spend time, sign in to MatchAndTalk instantly, start a live call with your camera, and have fun with unique video chat features.  Be careful, MatchAndTalk can be addictive!  Download MatchAndTalk to your mobile phone or tablet for free now and start to talk with live chatting with the members you like or randomly. Meet and call new single people, find your girlfriend or boyfriend.  POWERFUL FEATURES OF MATCHANDTALK;  * Download Matchandtalk for free. * Sign up for free with your Facebook, Twitter, Google + accounts, mobile number or email address. * Start one-to-one live video chat with Random button. * Send messages and read info even when users are offline. * Search for a profile based on the gender, age you are interested in. * Add new people to your friends list. * Get notified of missed video calls and voice calls. Call them back easily. * View photos of beautiful women and handsome men. * Like photos, make them notified with notification. * Get notified about offline users when they go online or open their camera. * Send and receive gifts. * Open or close your listing, camera or messages whenever you want.  A quick and easy way to find a male or female partner. Millions of members are waiting for you to reach them.   Follow us;  www.facebook.com/matchandtalk www.instagram.com/matchandtalk  www.twitter.com/matchandtalk    In this platform, we care importance to the privacy and authenticity of the members. You can share your questions and recommendations from this email: support@matchandtalk.com  More details can be found here: https://www.matchandtalk.com/PrivacyPolicy https://www.matchandtalk.com/TermsOfUse
